name: The Secret Planet
description:
The Secret Planet is a classic 2D adventure game.Your ship has crashed and you have landed on an unknown planet.You need to explore it and try to get out of it.After all, you can only rely on yourself.No one knows about this planet and no one knows what can await you ahead of your journey.
Key Features :

- The opportunity to become the discoverer of a secret planet.

- Open world

- nice soundtrack
